title: Bought RP and did not receive the RP
body: I went to buy 10$ worth of RP and the page loading before the conformations and the page never went through, just started happening, didn't know if this was a me thing, or I'll need to put in a ticket.

replies.body: Thanks for letting us know that you're getting stuck at the processing screen.  This issue is being looked into now, and a few players are experiencing this so you're not alone.  We don't have any eta just yet!
